version_description: Bug fix and performance improvement.
Bug fix and performance improvement.
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Happy New Year! Let’s ring in 2020 with BRAND NEW content.

Our latest update includes:

• 600+ Sound Effect Clips & Background Music Tracks – so you can create a cinematic masterpiece complete with music and electrifying sound effects!
• 200+ Color Filters – to make your videos stand out from the rest with a host of new vibrant color filters now available.
Upgrade to the latest version of PowerDirector to get the FULL editing experience. Plus, you can also preview new premium content and demo videos in this latest version. Try it today!

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

What’s New in PowerDirector:

1.1.2
• iPad Support – enjoy an incredible video editing experience with iconic PowerDirector features and content now available on iPad (The latest iOS/iPad OS 13 is recommended).
• UI Improvement and Optimization.

1.1.1
• Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements.

1.1
• 600+ Sound Effect Clips & Background Music Tracks – so you can create a cinematic masterpiece complete with music and electrifying sound effects!
• 200+ Color Filters – to make your videos stand out from the rest with a host of new vibrant color filters!

Upgrade to the latest version of PowerDirector to get the FULL editing experience. Try it today!


- The PowerDirector App Team

1.2
Create cinematic productions with Hollywood-like special effects on your mobile!

• Blending Modes – Overlay clips to produce double exposure effects with multiple blending modes.
• Four NEW Mask tools – Overlay and adjust clips with Linear, Parallel, Rectangle, and Eclipse masks. Fuse your videos or photos to create amazing surrealistic creations.
• UI Improvement and Optimization.

Enjoy the latest update for PowerDirector with:

1.3
• Updated User Interface: we continuously review and update the app and UI to make video editing faster and more intuitive.
• Stock Video: create even better movies with royalty-free stock footage, perfect for adding in scenes when you're not able to go out and shoot.
• Adds iOS 13.4 support

1.2
• Blending Modes – Overlay clips to produce double exposure effects with multiple blending modes.
• Mask tools – Overlay and adjust clips with Linear, Parallel, Rectangle, and Eclipse masks. Fuse your videos or photos to create amazing surrealistic creations.

1.1
• 600+ Sound Effect Clips & Background Music Tracks – so you can create a cinematic masterpiece complete with music and electrifying sound effects!
• 200+ Color Filters – to make your videos stand out from the rest with a host of new vibrant color filters!

Upgrade to the latest version of PowerDirector to get the FULL editing experience. Try it today!

- The PowerDirector App Team

Keep your PowerDirector app updated for the latest features and content on your iPhone and iPad. Here's what this update brings for your video projects:
1.4
-Never be stuck for content with stock videos from Pixabay.
-Premium users can now add up to 9 audio tracks (up to 3 on the free plan)
-New background music & effects categories: Lounge and Jingles.
-Localized language support for Thai, Malay and Hindi.

P.S. Write us a review if you enjoy using PowerDirector, thank you!

- The PowerDirector App Team

Keep your PowerDirector app updated for the latest features and content on your iPhone and iPad. Here's what this update brings for your video projects:

2.0
• Enjoy precision editing with new keyframe controls. You can now adjust the transparency, rotation, position and scale for picture in picture and masks.
• Plus enjoy the ability to add stunning video effects to any and every overlay.
• We’re always improving our core features and user experience. This month:
- Not only by drag & drop, now you can tap + button to insert clips at 00:00
- Settings: Show file names in your library
- Add a settings entry to the bottom of the launcher

Keep your PowerDirector app updated for the latest features and content on your iPhone and iPad. Here's what this update brings for your video projects:

4.0
• Which premium effect pack is best for you? Preview premium effects in your video and try before you buy.
• Enjoy precision editing with new keyframe controls. Set keyframes to adjust a clip's volume and fade in / fade out your audio.

New version 5.0

Did you ever think that text animation could be so simple?
• Create polished, professional-looking title sequences with 32 in/out text animation effects.
• Choose from a collection of backdrop shapes and make your titles pop on screen
• Give your videos a cinematic look with a selection of 14 motion graphic titles.

Keep your PowerDirector app updated for the latest features and content on your iPhone and iPad. Here's what this update brings for your video projects:

New version 8.0

• Replace the black bars from your vertical videos with a customizable background. Get creative with blur, color, and gradient effects to really make your video POP!
• Add even more tools to your toolbox with NEW transitions, fonts and stickers. A fantastic addition to your next project!
• Give your videos that festive flair with all NEW Christmas background music.

• Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements.
• Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements.

New version 8.1

• Premium users can now access our AI-enabled noise reduction tool, Denoise. Perfect for cleaning up unwanted background noise in your video recordings.
• Beautify your videos with the perfect background and say goodbye to distracting black bars with Fit and Fill.
• Give your videos a timeless charm with 10 new classically inspired motion graphic titles.
• Are you tired of using the same old transitions? We’ve added 10 new seamless and dynamic transitions to boost your next project.

New version 8.1

• Premium users can now access our AI-enabled noise reduction tool, Denoise. Perfect for cleaning up unwanted background noise in your video recordings.
• Beautify your videos with the perfect background and say goodbye to distracting black bars with Fit and Fill.
• Give your videos a timeless charm with 10 new classically inspired motion graphic titles.
• Are you tired of using the same old transitions? We’ve added 10 new seamless and dynamic transitions to boost your next project.

New version 8.2.2

• Premium users can now get access to simple yet enticing split transitions and broadcast-ready titles that’ll give your videos a sophisticated look.
• Find the dimensions you need to create perfectly sized videos for Instagram and YouTube with expanded aspect ratio support.
• Valentine's Day is just around the corner. If you’re struggling with the language of love this season, express your emotions with stickers instead.

New version 8.2.2

• Premium users can now get access to simple yet enticing split transitions and broadcast-ready titles that’ll give your videos a sophisticated look.
• Find the dimensions you need to create perfectly sized videos for Instagram and YouTube with expanded aspect ratio support.
• Valentine's Day is just around the corner. If you’re struggling with the language of love this season, express your emotions with stickers instead.

New version 9.0

Hello! We’re back with very exciting news!

Updated UI
• We have spent a lot of time cleaning up the layout and basic functionality to give you a new standard of usability and workflow intuitiveness.

Bug fixes
In this version, we’ve also worked on making PowerDirector more user friendly, including:
• Smoother than ever exports
• Fixed the issue with trim & keep audio pitch when the video speed is adjusted
• Other minor bug fixes

• We have spent a lot of time cleaning up the layout and basic functionality to give you a new standard of usability and workflow intuitiveness.

Bug fixes
In this version, we’ve also worked on making PowerDirector more user friendly, including:
• Smoother than ever exports
• Fixed the issue with trim & keep audio pitch when the video speed is adjusted
• Other minor bug fixes

New version 9.1

Hello! We’re back with very exciting news!

NEW Titles
• Excite, entertain and sparkle with brand new customizable title effects. Also, preview premium effects before you buy to find the perfect match for your videos.
• Elevate your titles with unique motion-graphic sequences. Select from a range of stunning, ready-to-use interactive titles to find your style.

NEW Stickers
• Wish your friends and family a successful egg hunt this year with animated stickers for Easter.

New version 9.2

Hello! We’re back with very exciting news!

NEW Feature
• Create awe-inspiring intros and outros in a snap with video templates.
NEW Titles
• Add modern, minimalist motion graphic titles to your footage for a simple yet refined aesthetic.
NEW Stickers
• Make your videos visually appealing with dreamy, eye-catching bokeh effect stickers.
NEW Transitions
• Awaken your artistic spirit and express the deepest parts of your imagination with beautiful brush effect transitions.
NEW Overlays
• Illuminate your footage with light leaks that can soften a scene and create a vintage or dreamy impact on your videos.
